item.title: Redis advance III
item.description: What’s Redis Cluster Redis Cluster is a distributed implementation of Redis with the following goals in order of importance in the design: High performance and linear scalability up to 1000 nodes. There are no proxies, asynchronous replication is used, and no merge operations are performed on values. 在多达 1000 个节点的时候仍能保持高性能及线性的可扩
